Its less hate and more disappointed that something like that didn't get in. 

Also I cant remember if those were just rumors or if they were actually talked about.

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54ffe7f8636872075a603f00#post_54ffe7f8636872075a603f00
I think it's okay to hate a game for what it isn't when a developer specifically shows or states that something will be in the game and it's not.  like mass effect 3, bioshock infinite or anything made by David cage or peter moleneux

But in this situation, since it's only rumors, I'd say capcom didn't really do anything wrong with dmc4.

topics.body:
I just woke up from a yet another interesting dream.

I was parkouring through a dense, dark forest with a huge fucking tree on my back. I was taking the tree to the top of a mountain to make it an offering to the thunder god, but the forces of the underworld summoned a great blizzard to slow me down and a great darkness to make me lose my way. 
But i was helped through the darkness by bright flashes of lightning the thunder god used to guide me.


It was pretty metal.
